* Main entry point of the Duke chatbot application.
* Duke coordinates the UI, storage, task list and parser to execute user commands.

return "event " + description + " START: " + this.start.format(out) + " DUE: " + this.end.format(out);

* Prints output after deleting a task.

* Prints output after marking a task as completed.
